task.RealTimeTask.label: ğŸ¤– Real-time Assist
task.RealTimeTask.description: Runs continuously, monitors the game screen in real time, and presses required keys automatically.
option.AutoSkip.label: Auto Story
option.AutoSkipAll.label: Skip All Story
option.AutoSkipAll.description: During Auto Story, automatically click the Skip button to skip all story.
option.AutoSkipChoose.label: Auto Choose Branch Options
option.AutoSkipChoose.description: During Auto Story, automatically choose branch options.
option.AutoSkipNext.label: Speed Up Story Playback
option.AutoSkipNext.description: During Auto Story, keep tapping to speed up story playback.
option.AutoCloseInteraction.label: Auto Interaction Handling
option.AutoCloseInteraction.description: Automatically handle: tutorial guide, manual paging, click anywhere to continue, archive closing, etc.
option.EnableTutorialGuide.label: Click Tutorial Guide
option.EnableTutorialGuide.description: Automatically click white guide gestures/arrows on screen (ğŸ›‘ Enabling this will significantly slow down the loop speed!!)
option.EnableTutorialBook.label: Read Manual
option.EnableTutorialBook.description: Automatically page through and confirm manual tutorial popups
option.EnableClickAnywhere.label: Click Anywhere to Continue
option.EnableClickAnywhere.description: Automatically detect and click fullscreen overlay prompts
option.EnableCloseSpecialPanel.label: Close Archive/Voice
option.EnableCloseSpecialPanel.descripti: Automatically detect and close story documents or voice log interfaces
option.AutoFight.label: Combat Assist
option.AutoFightAttack.label: Auto Basic Attack
option.AutoFightAttackKey.label: Auto Attack Without Mouse Grab
option.AutoFightAttackKey.description: Requires in-game setting: Basic Attack - Key 2 set to 0, enabling keyboard-based auto attack without interfering with mouse control
option.AutoFightSkill.label: Auto Use Skills
option.AutoFightEndSkill.label: Auto Use Ultimate
option.AutoFightCombo.label: Auto Trigger Link Skills
option.AutoFightLockTarget.label: Auto Lock Target
option.AutoFightSaveDamage.label: Auto Save Damage Images (Test)
option.AutoPick.label: Auto Pick Up
option.QuickTeleport.label: Quick Teleport
option.QuickTeleport.description: When selecting a teleport point on the world map (or from a list), automatically click Teleport.
option.AutoPuzzleSolving.label: Auto Solve Puzzle
option.AutoPuzzleSolving.description: Automatically clears the puzzle minigame for you (equivalent to enabling the âŒˆğŸ§© Auto Solve PuzzleâŒ‹ task in Loop mode).
option.AutoTaskInterval.label: Real-time Assist Interval
option.AutoTaskInterval.inputs.CheckInte: Too small an interval may cause lag. Adjust as needed; recommended to be at least 50ms.
option.AutoZipline.label: Auto Long-distance Zipline
option.AutoPat.label: Auto Pat
option.AutoPat.description: Pat the pack animals. Works better with auto pickup. Cannot detect duplicate pats, recommend switching animals quickly after patting.
task.EssenceFilter.label: ğŸ”’Essence Filter Lock
task.EssenceFilter.description: Based on your weapon rarity selection, the Essence of all matching weapons will be locked. Please select at least one.
option.Rarity6Weapon.label: â˜…6 Weapons
option.Rarity5Weapon.label: â˜…5 Weapons
option.Rarity4Weapon.label: â˜…4 Weapons
option.Rarity3Weapon.label: â˜…3 Weapons
option.FlawlessEssence.label: ğŸŸ¨Flawless Essence
option.PureEssence.label: ğŸŸªPure Essence
task.PuzzleSolver.label: ğŸ§© Auto Solve Puzzle
task.PuzzleSolver.description: Automatically solve puzzle mini-games for you. No need to think anymore!
option.PuzzleSolverMode.label: Mode
option.PuzzleSolverMode.description:
- Single Run: Task ends automatically after successfully solving once
- Loop: Repeat solving until manually stopped
- Demo Only: Does not actually solve, only demonstrates steps (you'll still need to solve it yourself)
option.PuzzleSolverMode.cases.Loop.label: Loop
task.DijiangRewards.label: ğŸBase Rewards
task.DijiangRewards.description: Auto-collect products, restock materials, and manage Clue exchange.
option.AutoStartExchange.label: Auto Start Clue Exchange
option.AutoStartExchange.description: Automatically starts clue exchange during base tasks. It is not recommended to enable this option, as clue exchange tasks should wait for credit point transaction tasks to actively initiate in order to obtain high-value items.
option.ProductionAssistanceWithoutTheCon: Production Assistance without Master Control Nexus
When enabled, the mood recovery function of the Master Control Nexus is disabled
task.DailyRewards.label: ğŸ“… Claim Daily Rewards
option.DailyTaskRewards.label: Daily Mission Rewards
option.DailyEmailRewards.label: Mail/Temporary Storage Rewards
option.DailyEventRewards.label: Event Rewards
option.DailyProtocolPassRewards.label: Protocol Pass Rewards
task.WeaponUpgrade.label: ğŸ”«Weapon Upgrade
task.WeaponUpgrade.description: Automatically select a weapon with the lowest rarity and level, and upgrade it by one level
task.Crafting.label: ğŸ§ªSimple Crafting
task.GearAssembly.label: ğŸ”§Gear Assembly
task.GearAssembly.description: Automatically assemble one piece of the lowest-level gear
option.DailyTaskUpgradeWeapon.label: Weapon Upgrade
option.DailyTaskUpgradeWeapon.desc: Automatically level up the lowest-level weapon once to earn activity points.
option.DailyTaskAssemble.label: Assemble Gear
option.DailyTaskAssemble.desc: Automatically assemble the lowest-level gear once to earn activity points.
option.DailyTaskCreation.label: Simple Crafting
option.DailyTaskCreation.desc: Automatically perform simple crafting once to earn activity points.
task.AutoResell.label: ğŸ’° Semi-automatic Resell
task.AutoResell.description: Automatically resell elastic demand supplies by identifying the highest profit goods. You can choose to automatically purchase and sell at friends' ships, or just get purchase recommendations.
option.AutoBuyAndSell.label: Auto Buy/Sell
option.AutoBuyAndSell.description: When enabled, automatically purchases and sells; when disabled, only identifies prices and provides purchase recommendations without actual buying/selling. Note: Auto buy/sell is only available with 'Win32-Front' controller configuration.
option.AutoChangeRegion.label: Auto Region Switching
option.ImportMinimumProfit.label: Minimum Profit
option.ImportMinimumProfit.inputs.Import: If the maximum profit is lower than this value, no purchase will be made. Integer only.
task.Resell.label: ğŸ’° One-click Resell
task.Resell.description: On the Unstable Supply Store page, automatically identify the highest profit goods and purchase them. **Start this task on the Unstable Supply Store page.**
task.CreditShopping.label: ğŸ›ï¸ Credit Shopping
task.CreditShopping.description: Purchase items from the Credit Exchange
option.CreditShoppingOptions.label: Advanced Settings
option.CreditShoppingForce.label: Ignore blacklist when credits overflow
option.CreditShoppingOnlyDiscount.label: Only buy discounted credit items
option.CreditShoppingOnlyDiscount.descri: âš ï¸Note: This may cause credit overflow! Whitelisted items will still be purchased even if not discounted!
option.CreditShoppingReserve.label: Stop buying when credits below 300
option.CreditShoppingReserve.description: Whitelisted items will still be purchased even below 300 credits!
option.AutoGetCredits.label: Automatically Get Credits
option.AutoGetCredits.description: Infrastructure linkage feature, automatically go to the Dijiang reception room to collect credits when credits are insufficient.
task.ImportBluePrints.label: ğŸ“ Import Blueprints
task.ImportBluePrints.description: Batch import blueprints with smart parsing.
option.ImportBluePrints.label: Import Blueprints
option.ImportBluePrints.inputs.ImportBlu: Enter text (any characters allowed). Blueprint share codes will be extracted intelligently.
task.DeliveryJobs.ValleyIVDepotLocked: Valley IV depot node is locked
task.DeliveryJobs.label: ğŸššAuto Delivery Jobs
task.DeliveryJobs.description:
Automatically accept and hand over delivery jobs.
Please select the regions to enable:

task.ClaimSimulationRewards.description: Please start within the Simulation Space menu
task.ClaimSimulationRewards.error_not_fo: Simulation UI not detected. Please switch manually.
task.ItemTransfer.label: ğŸŒ Inventory Transfer
task.ItemTransfer.description: Batch transfer specified items between different regions. Please start the task after finding the static dark background on Dijiang.
task.ItemTransfer.item_not_found: Failed to find target item, scrolled back to top but recognition failed
task.ItemTransfer.bag_return_completed: Destination warehouse is full, remaining items have been returned to origin warehouse
option.ItemTransferWhatToTransfer.label: Item to Transfer
option.ItemTransferOriginRegion.label: Source Region (Starting Point)
option.ItemTransferOriginRegion.descript: The warehouse region where the item is currently located.
option.ItemTransferDestinationRegion.des: The warehouse region where the item will be moved to.
option.ItemTransferTransferAll.label: Unlimited Transfer
option.ItemTransferTransferAll.descripti: When enabled, items will be transferred unlimited times.
option.ItemTransferTransferTimes.label: Transfer Count Settings
option.ItemTransferTransferTimes.input.d: The number of times to perform the transfer operation.
option.ItemTransferTransferTimes.input.e: Please enter an integer greater than 0.
task.SellProduct.label: ğŸ›’ One-click Sell Products
task.SellProduct.description: Use products at various outposts to exchange for corresponding procurement vouchers.
task.VisitFriends.label: ğŸ¤ Auto Visit Friends
task.VisitFriends.description: Automatically visit friends to perform support and intel exchange.
option.PriorStealVegetables.label: Steal Vegetables Mode
option.PriorStealVegetables.description: When enabled: vegetables can be stolen only when both production-assist and clue-exchange counts are 1â€“5. Before entering the ship, both growth chamber assist availability and clue exchange availability must be met. Due to script logic, it may not visit all eligible friends to meet the 5 steal-vegetable quota; please check manually if any are missed. If the quota is not met, adding more friends is recommended.
task.ReceiveProdManual.label: ğŸŒ¾ Claim All Simple Crafting Manual Rewards
task.ReceiveProdManual.description: Claim all simple crafting manual rewards. **You can start this task from: Manual Progress / Manual List / Inventory / Navigation Menu / Main Interface.**
task.ReadAllWiki.label: ğŸ“– Mark All Encyclopedia as Read
task.ReadAllWiki.description: Clear all unread red dots in the encyclopedia. **Start this task from the Endfield Encyclopedia home page.**
task.BakerEntry.label: ğŸ’¬ Clear Chat Messages
task.SimpleProductionBatch.label: ğŸ”¨ Batch Simple Crafting
task.SimpleProductionBatch.description: Perform batch simple crafting with one click. Make sure you have enough inventory space before execution. **Please select the items to craft on the Simple Crafting page before starting the script**.
task.SimpleProductionBatch.error_not_fou: **Please select the items to craft on the Simple Crafting page before starting the script**.
task.PCOpenGame.label: ğŸ® Enter Game (PC)
task.PCOpenGame.description: Enter the game on PC. Please launch the game manually first.
task.AndroidOpenGame.label: ğŸ® Launch Game (Android)
task.AndroidOpenGame.description: Launch the game on Android. Please open the emulator manually first.
task.SeizeEntrustTask.label: ğŸŒ†Auto Accept Commission
task.SeizeEntrustTask.description: Only accept orders in Master Zhuang's territoryï½ğŸŒ† Only take Wuling orders of 73,100 ~ (Please launch this task in the delivery commission list)
task.SeizeEntrustTaskisSwipeMiddle.label: Swipe down from the middle to find the Wuling Order
task.SeizeEntrustTaskisSwipeMiddle.descr:
When enabled, it only swipes to the middle, not to the very top.
If disabled, you need to manually swipe to the position where Wuling Orders may appear, usually above the 50,000 Valley Order or at the very bottom of the list.
task.SeizeEntrustTaskisSwipeALL.label: Swipe to traverse all orders
task.SeizeEntrustTaskisSwipeALL.descript: When enabled, it will search through all orders from start to finish. It is recommended to enable this only if all orders can be traversed within 5 seconds. ~~Can be used to kill time ()~~
